metadata.title: Info Secretary Ambreen Jan pays farewell call on DPM Dar

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Federal Secretary Information and Broadcasting Ambreen Jan on Thursday paid a farewell call on Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar. The deputy prime minister appreciated her dedicated service, professionalism and valuable contributions throughout her distinguished career. Ishaq Dar also conveyed best wishes for her future endeavors.
